snippet: The president of the European Central Bank, Mario Draghi, is underlining the bank’s willingness to add more monetary stimulus if needed at its December meeting to push inflation higher.
abstract: European Central Bank president Mario Draghi says bank will consider adding more monetary stimulus if necessary at December meeting to spark inflation.
lead_paragraph: The president of the European Central Bank, Mario Draghi, is underlining the bank’s willingness to add more monetary stimulus if needed at its December meeting to push inflation higher.

headline.print_headline: Seeing Weakness, Europe Considers More Stimulus
headline.main: Seeing Weakness, Europe Considers More Stimulus
